Package net.minecraft.src.modoptionsapi

Interface Summary
MODisplayString Used to manipulate a display string for a Mod Option Intended to be used as an anonymous class
 

Class Summary
GuiModScrollOptions A scrollable screen for modoptionsapi
MOCallback The callback interface for modoptions API
ModBooleanOption Boolean Option API
ModMappedMultiOption Multiple Selector API with Integer -> String mappings
ModMultiOption Multiple Selector API
ModOption<E> Abstract base class for individual option classes
ModOptions An abstract representation of a set of options for a single mod
ModOptionsAPI Controller class for the API.
ModOptionsGuiController Controller class for a Mod's Option menu
ModSliderOption Provides an interface to create a simple bounded slider
MOFormatters Container class for formatters
MOFormatters.SuffixFormat Formatting class for a given suffix with a space between
MOGuiSlider A replacement for the default MC Slider.
 

Exception Summary
IncompatibleOptionTypeException  
MOMissingModException
